doc.title: Aller Tage Abend
doc.plot: Woody Allens 'Death Knocks' reversed: An old man in his underwear is preparing dinner. It knocks. The old man never had a visitor in his entire life and when he opens the door a young man forces his way in. He wants to file a complaint. He lived his life according to every rule imaginable. Now he wants to end it. And only the old man can help, because his job is to take life. But even the Grim Reaper can't change destiny...
